solution_line_template: Over {num_weeks} weeks Jack saves ${weekly_savings}/week x {num_weeks} weeks = $<<{weekly_savings}*{num_weeks}={total_savings_over_weeks}>>{total_savings_over_weeks}

In total Jack has ${initial_piggy_bank_amount} + ${total_savings_over_weeks} = $<<{initial_piggy_bank_amount}+{total_savings_over_weeks}={total_amount_in_piggy_bank}>>{total_amount_in_piggy_bank} dollars in his piggy bank
